ndz_document.ndz_title: Field Due to an Infinite Straight Current Filament
ndz_document.ndz_abstract: This simple formula can be derived directly from Maxwell's fourth equation, or Ampere's Law.

ndz_section.p:
B is the magnetic field, in teslas. The direction of the field is tangent to a circle on a radius r (in meters) from the wire.
μo is the permeability constant (1.26x10-6 H/m)
i is the current in the wire, in amperes.
